FEATURE_ISOMORPHIC_DESC: Catberry builds a browser version of the application using browserify and it works as the SPA in a browser
FEATURE_COMPONENTS_DESC: It is similar with web-components by Google, but they are rendered at the server as well as in a browser
FEATURE_FLUX_DESC: The framework is built using Flux architecture. You just need to implement Stores and Cat-Components
FEATURE_SEO_DESC: Search crawler receives the full page as well as a regular user. The whole state of the application is restored from URL
FEATURE_FAST_DESC: Server-side progressive rendering based on node.js streams and parallel rendering of components in a browser
FEATURE_READY_DESC: The framework is well-tested (code coverage is about 95%) and already used in public-deployed applications
